DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Role Follicular Output Rate Preovulatory Count Prediction Pregnancy Women With Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome Undergoing Intra Cytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI )
DOC.detailed_description: Our study observational , observe data routine measurement IVF/ICSI . Our study ass IVF/ICSI intervention , evaluate role FSI preovulatory count calculate observe routine measurement IVF/ICSI procedure . All woman fulfil inclusion criterion invite participate study . A write informed consent take woman sign consent include study . Patients include study subject full history take clinical examination include general , abdominal gynecological examination . This follow vaginal ultrasound scan ass uterus , ovary pelvic mass . All woman go usual IVF/ICSI procedure explain , aim observe antral follicle count , pre-ovulatory count , calculate FORT . On second day menstruation serum FSH , LH , Prolactin Oestradiol assess antral follicular count ( AFC ) assess use vaginal ultrasound scan . AFC define number follicle measure 3-10mm . All patient standard pituitary down-regulation protocol GnRHa ( Triptorelin 0.1mg , Decapeptyl® Ferring , Germany ) day 7 ovulation previous cycle day 21 oral contraceptive cycle . GnRHa continue 2 week . FSH ( Fostimon ®IBSA ) 150-300 IU/day administer day HCG administration . On day HCG administration , ovarian ultrasound scan perform use transvaginal probe Preovulatory follicle count ( PC ) assess , ( PFC ) define number follicle measuring≥16mm . FORT calculate : ( PFC ) * 100/AFC . The procedure cancel less 3 follicle 16-20 mm size present 12 day start FSH despite dos reach 450 IU . The cycle also cancel risk ovarian hyperstimulation like massive ovarian enlargement serum estradiol exceed 3000pg/L Transvaginal oocyte retrieval perform 34-36 h administration HCG . Oocytes fertilized either via IVF ICSI base couple 's history . Fertilization assess 16-18 h IVF ICSI . Embryo transfer perform 3 day oocyte retrieval . No three embryo per patient transfer ; vaginal tablet contain progesterone ( Prontogest® IBSA ) administer 400 mg/day luteal support day oocyte retrieval . Pregnancy define appearance intrauterine gestational sac vaginal ultrasound 5 week embryo transfer .
DOC.criteria: PCOS diagnose use Rotterdam criterion Age 2040 year Both ovary present Day 2 FSH < 10 mIU/L Day 2 Estradiol < 50 pg/L Other cause subfertility Abnormalities affect uterine cavity Uncontrolled diabetes Allergy gonadotrophin Cancelled cycle study
